scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @reviewscope/llm-core && npm run build -w @reviewscope/rules-engine && npm run build -w @reviewscope/security && npm run build -w @reviewscope/context-engine
scripts.build:apps: npm run build -w @reviewscope/api && npm run build -w @reviewscope/worker && npm run build -w @reviewscope/dashboard
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:api-only: npm run build:packages && npm run build -w @reviewscope/api && npm run build -w @reviewscope/worker
scripts.bun:build:packages: bun run --filter @reviewscope/llm-core build && bun run --filter @reviewscope/rules-engine build && bun run --filter @reviewscope/security build && bun run --filter @reviewscope/context-engine build
scripts.bun:build:apps: bun run --filter @reviewscope/api build && bun run --filter @reviewscope/worker build && bun run --filter @reviewscope/dashboard build
scripts.bun:build: bun run bun:build:packages && bun run bun:build:apps
scripts.bun:build:api-only: bun run bun:build:packages && bun run --filter @reviewscope/api build && bun run --filter @reviewscope/worker build
